div.p:
It is with great pleasure that I welcome you to the Village Charter School website. We are excited for you to explore and discover what makes this school so special. From the moment you first step foot onto the ten acre campus of Village Charter School, you will feel a strong...

a.aria-label: Show All links and Link Categories

br.br:
Now you can support The Village Charter School while you shop on Amazon! That's right! Amazon will donate about .5% of approved purchases directly to The Village Charter School - at no cost to you.
By clicking on the icon below you'll be redirected to Amazon Smile. Just simply select "Village Charter School" as your preferred non-profit and start shopping! Be sure to share this information with friends and family - because every little bit helps.
As always, thank you for supporting The Village Charter School.

td.br: VCS CARES ABOUT YOU AND WE ARE HERE FOR YOU!! #StayHome #StaySafe

*Log into PowerSchool.
*Click the Grades and Attendance tab on the left.
*Go to the Q3 column for all your child's classes.
*To see the teacher's comments, you must click on the grade for that class.
